s2191: Thirty-seventh year: attacked Zhou, wounding the king.
s2198: Twenty-fifth year: the Shan Rong attacked us.
s2199: Quwo Wu Gong killed Xiao Zi. Zhou attacked Quwo, establishing Jin Ai Hou's younger brother Min as Jin Hou. (Jin Hou Min's first year.)
s2201: Thirty-fifth year: invaded Sui; Sui implemented good government and they stopped.
s2207: Thirty-eighth year: Crown Prince Hu rescued Qi; Qi intended to marry him to their princess.
s2220: Second year: gave birth to Jing Zhong Wan. The Zhou scribe divined that Wan's descendants would become kings of Qi.
s2233: Thirty-seventh year: attacked Sui but did not capture it; made an alliance and withdrew troops.
s2283: Eighteenth year: Crown Prince Ji and his younger brother Shou contended and both died.
s2300: Seventh year: the duke committed adultery with a woman from Cai; Cai killed the duke.
s2310: Thirty-second year: Xi Gong commanded Wu Zhi to arrange official positions equivalent to the crown prince's.
s2316: Chen: Zhuang Gong Lin's first year (son of Huan Gong).
s2328: Sixth year: San Fu killed Chu Zi and established his elder brother as Wu Gong.
s2335: Third year: the feudal lords attacked us to avenge Song.
s2341: Fifteenth year: the Heavenly King requested chariots in an improper manner.
s2342: Qi: Xiang Gong Zhu Er's first year - demoted Wu Zhi's official position; Wu Zhi resented it.
s2344: Qin: Wu Gong's first year - attacked Peng, reaching Hua Mountain.
s2347: Third year: Shuo fled to Qi; they established Qian Mu.
s2351: Fourth year: Ji Zhong established Hu; the duke went to live in Li.
s2356: Zhuang Wang's first year: gave birth to son Kui.
s2357: Sixteenth year: the duke met with Cao, planning to attack Zheng.
s2367: Zheng: Zhao Gong Hu's first year. (Hu's mother was a woman from Deng; Ji Zhong married her.)
s2372: Second year: had a younger brother named Ke.
s2373: Seventeenth year: solar eclipse; the day was not recorded as the officials lost track of it.
s2383: Second year: Qu Mi killed Zhao Gong.
s2389: Eighteenth year: the duke and his consort went to Qi; Qi Hou committed adultery with her and sent Peng Sheng to kill the duke in his chariot.
s2390: Fourth year: killed Lu Huan Gong and executed Peng Sheng.
s2404: Fourth year: Zhou Gong wanted to kill the king and establish Zi Ke; the king executed Zhou Gong; Ke fled to Yan.
s2415: Zheng: Zi Ying's first year (younger brother of Zi Wei).
s2428: Chen: Xuan Gong Chu Jiu's first year (Chu Jiu, younger brother of Zhuang Gong).
s2454: Eighth year: attacked Ji, abandoning their capital city.
s2457: Fifty-first year: the king attacked; Sui reported that the consort's heart was disturbed; the king died in the army camp.
s2469: Fifth year: with Qi attacked Wei, welcoming Hui Gong (to the throne).
s2473: Chu: Wen Wang Zi's first year - first established the capital at Ying.
s2489: Second year: attacked Shen, passing through Deng; Deng's nephew said Chu could be conquered; Deng Hou refused.
s2501: Seventh year: stars fell like rain, accompanied by rain.
s2507: Tenth year: Qi established Hui Gong; Qian Mu fled to Zhou.
s2517: Eighth year: Zi Jiu came fleeing; together with Guan Zhong avoided Wu Zhi's rebellion.
s2518: Twelfth year: Wu Zhi killed the ruler and established himself.
s2523: Wei: Hui Gong Shuo returned (to the throne). (Fourteenth year of his reign.)
s2533: Ninth year: Lu wanted to enter (Qi) with Jiu but arrived later than Xiao Bai; Qi blocked Lu and had Sheng deliver Guan Zhong alive.
s2534: Qi: Huan Gong Xiao Bai's first year, spring - Qi killed Wu Zhi.
s2549: Tenth year: Qi attacked us because of Jiu.
s2553: Sixth year: Xi consort (a woman from Chen) passed through Cai; Cai treated her discourteously so she hated them. Chu attacked Cai, captured Ai Hou, and returned.
s2557: Eleventh year: Chu captured our ruler.
s2565: Eleventh year: Zang Wen Zhong expressed condolences for Song's flooding.
s2570: Ninth year: Song suffered a great flood; the duke blamed himself. Lu sent Zang Wen Zhong to express condolences.
s2586: Tenth year: Wan killed the ruler; Qiu Mu acted righteously.
s2597: Thirteenth year: Cao Mo kidnapped Huan Gong and returned the lost territories.
s2598: Fifth year: met with people from Lu at Ke.
s2602: Song: Huan Gong Yu Shuo's first year (son of Zhuang Gong).
s2630: Seventh year: first became hegemon, assembling the feudal lords at Juan.
s2631: Twenty-eighth year: Quwo Wu Gong extinguished Jin Hou Min, presented treasures to Zhou; Zhou commanded Wu Gong to be ruler of Jin and annexed his territory.
s2639: Zheng: Li Gong's first year - Li Gong had fled and returned after seventeen years.
s2647: Jin: Wu Gong declared the annexation of Jin; already established thirty-eight years, did not change the reign title, continuing his first year.
s2648: Twentieth year: buried at Yong; first used humans to accompany in death.
s2649: Twelfth year: attacked Deng and extinguished it.
s2655: Second year: the feudal lords attacked us.
s2663: Thirty-ninth year: Wu Gong died; son Gui Zhu established as Xian Gong.
s2664: Qin: De Gong's first year (younger brother of Wu Gong).
s2676: Hui Wang's first year: took a consort from Chen.
s2680: Second year: first performed the Fu sacrifice, sacrificing to She; tore dogs at the four city gates.
s2692: Second year: Yan and Wei attacked the king; the king fled to Wen; Zi Kui was established.
s2698: Seventh year: took a woman from Wei. (Younger brother of Wen Gong.)
s2704: Sixteenth year: attacked the king; the king fled to Wen; Zi Kui was established.
s2720: Seventeenth year: Zheng captured our Zhong Fu.
s2724: Fourth year: executed Kui and restored Hui Wang.
s2735: Seventh year: rescued Zhou from disorder and restored the king.
s2740: Fifth year: the crown prince's mother died early. Hui consort gave birth to Shu Dai.
s2742: Fourteenth year: Chen Wan fled from Chen; the Tian clan began from this.
s2743: Fifth year: attacked Li Rong and obtained Ji.
s2744: Fourth year: established the Mi altar.
s2745: Fifth year: younger brother Yun killed Du Ao and established himself.
s2748: Twenty-first year: Li Gong's son Wan fled to Qi.
s2757: Twenty-third year: the duke went to Qi to observe the She sacrifice.
s2791: Eighth year: completely killed all the former Jin Hou's sons.
s2807: Ninth year: first built walls around Jiang as the capital.
s2820: Tenth year: granted Qi Hou the ducal command.
s2855: Twelfth year: Crown Prince Shen Sheng lived in Quwo, Chong Er in Pu city, Yi Wu in Qu. (Because of Li Ji.)
s2886: Twenty-third year: attacked Shan Rong for Yan's sake.
s2901: Thirty-second year: Zhuang Gong's younger brother Shu Ya died from poison. Qing Fu assassinated Zi Ban. Ji You fled to Chen and established Min Gong.
s2919: Sixteenth year: extinguished Wei, Geng, Huo. First enfeoffed Zhao Shu at Geng, Bi Wan at Wei - this began here.
s2933: Second year: Qing Fu killed Min Gong. Ji You from Chen established Shen as Xi Gong. Killed Qing Fu.
s2935: Seventeenth year: Shen Sheng served as general; the noblemen knew he would be discarded.
s2939: The Di attacked us. The duke favored cranes; the soldiers did not fight and our state was extinguished. The state resented it; Hui Gong caused disorder and extinguished his descendants. They again established Qian Mu's younger brother. (Wei: Dai Gong's first year.)
s2949: Lu: Xi Gong Shen's first year - Ai Jiang's funeral arrived from Qi.
s2950: Twenty-seventh year: killed younger sister (consort of Lu Zhuang Gong) because of debauchery.
s2955: Wei: Wen Gong Hui's first year (younger brother of Dai Gong).
s2966: Twenty-eighth year: built Chu Qiu for Wei; rescued from Rong Di attack.
s2967: Nineteenth year: Xun Xi used treasures to borrow passage from Yu to attack Guo, extinguishing Xia Yang.
s2971: Second year: Qi Huan Gong led the feudal lords to build Chu Qiu for us.
s2982: Twenty-ninth year: shared a boat with Cai Ji; it capsized the duke; the duke was angry and returned Cai Ji.
s2989: Eighteenth year: because of the woman, Qi attacked us.
s2998: Thirtieth year: led the feudal lords to attack Cai; Cai collapsed; then attacked Chu, demanding the tribute of wrapped mugwort.
s2999: Twenty-first year: Shen Sheng committed suicide due to Li Ji's slander. Chong Er fled to Pu; Yi Wu to Qu.
s3000: Fourth year: welcomed a consort from Jin.
s3001: Sixteenth year: Qi attacked us, reaching Xing; had Qu Wan conclude an alliance.
s3015: Twenty-second year: extinguished Yu and Guo. Chong Er fled to the Di.
s3030: Thirty-second year: led the feudal lords to attack Zheng.
s3031: Twenty-third year: Yi Wu fled to Liang.
